题目:
______ I ______ he has been to Tibet.
A. Not only; but
B. Neither; nor
C. As well; as
D. Either; and
提示: Neither...nor表示"既不...也不"，符合否定语境。

题目:
The air ticket will cost $30 ____ $31.
A. or
B. and
C. whether
D. less
提示: or连接两个可能的价格选项。

题目:
______ it is sunny ______ raining; he'll be in the office on time.
A. Either; or
B. Rather; than
C. Both; and
D. Whether; or
提示: Whether...or表示"无论...还是"，引导让步状语。

题目:
John, hurry up: ______ you'll be late for the bus.
A. but
B. or
C. and
D. else or
提示: or表示"否则"，用于警告后果。

题目:
She is not very rich: ______ she always sends some money to the poor.
A. but
B. so
C. and
D. or

He left the family ______ stayed as an unwelcome person.
A. other than
B. rather than
C. or else
D. therefore

______ class will take part in the composition contest is decided.
A. What
B. Whose
C. Which
D. That
提示: Which引导主语从句，表示选择。

题目:
We will call you ______ we get off the bus.
A. since
B. while
C. for
D. as soon as

She was ______ excited ______ tears came to her eyes immediately when she heard the good news.
A. so; that
B. such; that
C. in order; that
D. even; though

She was so happy ______ her heart would fly away.
A. even if
B. as if
C. so that
D. in order to
提示: as if表示"仿佛"，引导方式状语。

题目:
—Which color would you like better, red ______ green?
—Red, please.
A. as
B. and
C. or
D. with

______ she is a girl of eighteen, she can drive a truck.
A. Which
B. For
C. So
D. Though

______ she was not well. I decided to go to church by myself.
A. Although
B. As
C. With
D. Because of

My sister likes swimming ______ reading novels.
A. and
B. or
C. while
D. to

Although he is very handsome: ______ he is never proud of it.
A. but
B. and
C. /
D. or

I have been keeping the English and Chinese Dictionary ______ I can easily see it so that I can look the new words up in the dictionary at any time.
A. when
B. where
C. which
D. what

I bought the house, not ______ the house was beautiful but ______ the house was near a famous high middle school.
A. for, because
B. as; for
C. because; as
D. because; because

You may borrow the car ______ you promise not to damage it.
A. only just
B. but for
C. as if
D. as long as

题目:
______ he had written his novel for three hours, he felt very tired and sleepy.
A. After
B. Before
C. When
D. And

______ does she like going shopping: ______ she is fond of taking a trip.
A. Neither; nor
B. Not only; but also
C. Both; and
D. Only; but
提示: Not only...but also连接并列结构，前句需倒装。
